title: Harry S Truman National Historic Site: Social Media
body: Social Media              Harry S Truman National Historic Site is constantly searching for new ways to connect with you. Social media websites allow the park to expand the ways with which we communicate information, while also enabling and encouraging you to experience the park in an entirely new way. Get connected today!         Facebook Millions of people use Facebook everyday to engage in conversations, upload photos, share links and videos, and connect with the people they meet. "Like" HarrySTrumanNHS to receive the latest information and connect with Harry S Truman National Historic Site.         Twitter Twitter is a real-time information network that connects you to the latest news about the park. Sign up to follow @HarrySTrumanNPS to receive breaking news, severe weather warnings, closure updates, special event announcements, and other information.         YouTube Join Harry S Truman NHS on youtube to see videos and other multimedia works about Harry S Truman.
